itemDeletionConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete the item "{itemName}"? This action cannot be undone.
youAreMemberOfFollowingPlatforms: You are a member of the following platform(s):
contactAdminForPurchase: If you wish to order on one of your existing platforms, please contact the administrators of these platforms. They are the only ones authorized to place orders on them.
noAdminErrorMessage: Only platform administrators can purchase business experiences. Please turn to your administrator to purchase this business experience.
noTenantErrorMessage: To buy this business experince, you need a 3DEXPERIENCE platform.
failedToFetchUserData: Failed to fetch the user data
failedToOpenCheckout: Failed to open the checkout. Please contact the support if this problem persists.
failedToLoadProductInfo: Unable to load the product information page. Please contact the support if this error persists.
priceExceedsMaximum: Your order price exceeds the allowed payment limitations. Please consider splitting it up into several orders.
offerUnavailableInBuyerCountry: This offer is not available in your company's country
youAreAdminOfPlatform: You are administrator of the following platform:
clickTheButtonToConfirm: Please click the button below to confirm that the order will be deployed on this platform.
